website_summaries.verdict: Versatile stainless steel watch featuring brown dial with two subdials and date window at 6 o'clock.
pros: Stylish chronograph has various luxurious accents
A great daily watch with classic design
cons: Fluorescent accents and luminescence does not last very long

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking dress watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch based on its looks and it really does look good on my wrist. It's quite heavy and the numbers are easy to read. The leather strap is padded and feels nice on my skin. The brown face is dark and makes it a little more interesting than plain black. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Solid 5 star watch in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for just under $100. The face is large, but not obnoxiously. The leather strap matches the color of the dial (dark copper brown) which is what I like. If I had to nitpick, I'd say the band is too rigid (out of the box anyway). The box it came in had a soft fabric outer-layer and the pillow the watch is wrapped around inside the box shows off the timepiece perfectly if given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful watch and the lumm is great
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch and the lumm is great!! It's my first Seiko watch and I think next time I'm gonna get a automatic one plus the brown fave give it a fancy look and get the new one it doesn't come with the case that's the only down side but it comes with paperwork any how I feel like it's a great watch after all
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines.  Functional, minimalist watch.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Chronograph only does 60 minutes and I needed 30 ... perfect. Needed a sleek replacement for a stop watch and this fills the bill. Smooth operation. Reasonably good time piece accuracy. Been looking for 2 years for just this item. Actually surprised to find it. Much lighter and stress oriented than my Omega Speedmaster chronograph (stress $100 vs $5,000 timepiece). The Omega is a great SHTF item, but the Seiko precisely fit the purpose (timing CDL pre-trips). Glad I bought it. Very nice styling. Clean lines. So light I forget I am wearing it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bentwatertrail

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say that I really like it but I don’t the wrist band looks very cheap, the finish and stitches don’t look good for a seiko watch they could have done better, now unfortunately I bought the cronograph watch and so the date window is very small and the seconds hand doesn’t move with the time hands it works with the cronograph mode so it’s always still, I would not recommend it to no one
customer_reviews.author: Lando

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for two weeks now and really like it. It was a much-needed change from my older, smaller faced watches, yet not obnoxiously large. There is so much I like about the watch: the brown colored face, the chronograph where the second hand usually is gives it a classic stopwatch feel. I've tried NATO bands and a stainless steel link band. The brown face of the watch makes it a little hard to match with NATO bands, but the SS band looks great (although large at 22mm). The original leather band is a little creaky but looks great. I hope that the watch holds up well because it is a really nice timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: TheDividedSky

customer_reviews.title: the jury's still out...
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch, even though it's bigger than I'd like. The problem I've had is the stopwatch function sets the sweep second hand to 12 o'clock by itself, when I'm not wearing it (I have & wear other watches). Amazon has sent a replacement; it has reset the second hand a couple of times, but I'm not sure if I'd accidentally bumped that button, so it's on my nightstand for observation. I have 2 other Seiko watches, & they are both excellent watches, keeping good time & looking good on my wrist, but if the sweep second hand goes to 12 o'clock by itself while I'm not wearing it, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Hanby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. The watch case is not overly bulky and highly polished like many other popular watches. The watch face has a classic masculine style and a rather unique brownish/black tone. I was unsure about this at first- but it really draws attention to the watch because it is not simply black or white. The case looks great with many different types of leather bands and also pairs perfectly with just about any outfit. Very pleased..
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: When its time to replace your watch, this is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a simple, easy to read, high quality watch for about a week. Prices range from $14, up to $125. Looked at everything from Timex, Casio, Fossil, Invicta, and Biden. I finally checked out the Seiko. I didn't want fancy, just simple, functional, and stylish. Everything I was looking for, I found in the Seiko Men's SNN241 Stainless Steel. I didn't even mention the bright luminance dial. No trouble seeing these sharply etched numbers, or hands. As I said, simple, easy to read, and high quality. Seiko is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Heft

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice watch, but not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, its a nice looking watch. Coming from the Seiko titanium watches (own 3), it is somewhat heavier and larger in diameter. Both I could live with. What caused me return this particular watch is the thickness of the case. For guys that have a somewhat slimmer wrist, it just looks awkward in my opinion. Maybe I am just not into the "larger" modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Woblesocket

customer_reviews.title: Seiko broken after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great just like the picture. However, after 4 months, watch started to stop working. I thought it was the battery and took it to be replaced. Battery is fine and strong, it's the watch itself. Now I'm debating whether to throw it away or send it in to be fixed. It runs intermittently and dies when you set it down over night.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Big case size!
customer_reviews.text: Like all Seikos I have had, it is a well-made and accurate watch. The case size is very large, and does not really fit well on my 7.25 inch wrist. The dial is simply painted and does not have much visual interest. The band is of good quality, but the tang is surprisingly light-weight and cheap feeling. The water resistance to 100 meters is a real plus, as is the screw-on case back. I wear this watch on weekends with jeans and a t-shirt. I think it is too large and sporty to wear to the office 9-5.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Stanke

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wanted an everyday watch with a chronograph. I like having the stopwatch for keeping up with how long I bike..I wish it would have come in another band that is more suitable for everyday use....swimming, showering..etc but I bought it knowing that when the leather band gives way I will replace it with another type band. It is a good looking watch. My wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: billy beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great value...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch because the price was remarkable.. arrived with a $210.00 price tag, paid half that... watch looks more valuable than its price... I did change the strap to a lighter colour for $30.00 and the watch looks excellent with a $1,000 suit. Lume is distinct, clear... watch face is large... As an "extra" casual field style watch there is no shame with this Seiko at all...
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Allan VO

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of Seiko watches, but I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Seiko watches, but I'm on a budget. This watch is a Seiko just for me. The size is Goldilocks (not too small, not too big, just right!) The leather in the band is tough on the outside but supple on the inside. I wear it proudly every day.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seiko quality in a beautiful, manly package. I particularly like the chronograph movement, uses the large seconds hand as a chrono, makes great sense for those needing this function. Chocolat color is nice distinction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark OberleTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: I researched a number of watches before deciding on this one. I chose it due to its dependable maker, its style, and the overwhelmingly positive reviews. I'm not disappointed. It's a lovely timepiece with good features, easy to read, luminous dial in the dark, and a great stopwatch that I used at my granddaughters' track meet. The leather band is stylist and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: What a watch SNN241
customer_reviews.text: Better then expected. In fact this watch is on my wrist more than my 12 other high end watches. Easy to read and the lume is just fantastic. You will not be disappointed. If only it had a sapphire Crystal this watch would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AJayM

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch in a nice packaging, dial is perfect size for my wrist and the strap is not that bad actailly and fits well. It looks even better in real life than in photos shown. Lume is amazing at this price point, and the dial is really easy to read. Watch even arrived with original $215 tag on it. Great design and build quality and a price at which very few brands come close to Seiko level. Overall I'm very pleased with my first purchase through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: zanmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great, but strap is not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Only complaint is that the leather started to rot after a few months wearing it in the shower. Leather must be untreated or unsealed os something. And I'm having trouble finding a suitable replacement strap that's the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brown dial and great design
customer_reviews.text: Very sad to return this watch! The brown inner dial is stunning and overall a very handsome watch. For the price if you like the pics I can't imagine how anyone would be disappointed in person. Bought this for my son but then I fixed his current watch. And, its 2-3mm too big for me. Now I'm looking to see if they make the same in 40mm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and style of this watch. A simple and clean design. Leather band is of good quality. Not too thick or stiff. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PRB

customer_reviews.title: This watch has becone my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of 12 Seiko watches dating back to the early 80s. This watch has become my favorite. It's accurate, as well as easy to read. It is worth every penny I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: E A W

customer_reviews.title: Keeps great time, band small.
customer_reviews.text: Plain Jane brown watch. Seiko quality keeps great time, reliable and sturdy. Seiko created the quartz movement and their watches keep great time. Only complaint this watch band is smaller than any of my other Seikos. Last notch for a very average wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Seiko for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice size-larger than the 80's vintage Seiko I have but not quite as big as some of the Invicta's-which is a good thing. Nice casual or dress watch-stylish but not gawdy,typical Seiko. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: trLitFls

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a good buy. It's not trendy but it still looks good. It really comes alive outdoors as the brown dial has a subtle sunburst effect. The glow in the dark markers and hands are a nice touch. I don't wear it daily but the band has barely any signs of wear and tear after over a year of use. It has been knocked up a bit but there are not scratches, dents, etc. It also has enough adjustment for any size wrist. There is little to no need to punch additional holes. It feels really nice on the wrist too.
customer_reviews.author: Ksrd1996

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. I bought it for my husband's birthday but haven't given it to him yet. Really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: dbj922

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. Beautiful watch. He loves it and it’s worn daily with his flight uniform. Great quality. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: BeckiH

customer_reviews.title: Seiko!
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable price! I still enjoy wearing watches in this digital age. I collect them. You can’t go wrong with Seiko - price, quality, style, and accuracy. This one is a unique addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very classy looking watch that is keeping time on the dot compared to my atomic timekeeper at home. I was concerned about it not having a light but I tested the luminosity of the ink on the hands.....it is very bright and very easy to see at night.
customer_reviews.author: asntdr01

customer_reviews.title: Most important to know: it tells time.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Good watch. Watch tells me what time it is. Chronometer is good for telling me when to flip the chicken thighs on the grill. Watch makes me look like I have a good handle on life when actually don't. First Seiko in my collection, I will likely buy more. Big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for a fine watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, runs well. Better than Wash. DC! Always like brown and watches in that color difficult to find. Amazon is the place to go as usual. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jim arcand

customer_reviews.title: The battery information should be on the product page!
customer_reviews.text: No information on what battery is installed. Looked through my Amazon purchase information. I guess they want me to send it to a Seiko service center?
customer_reviews.author: El Cheapo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH EASY TO SEE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT WATCH EASY TO SEE, AND LIGHTS UP AT NIGHT IN THE DARK AND YOU CAN STILL SEE IT CLEARLY, I NEVER TAKE IT OFF
customer_reviews.author: neal spritz

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it!!! It is even better than I anticipated. He has had it for seven months so far, and he wears it every day. Even with so much use, it still looks brand new and, most importantly, it keeps great time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It is a simple, easy to set watch with bold, easy to read numbers. We have always found the Seiko brand to be both affordable and dependable. Being attractive is a nice bonus, isn't it!
customer_reviews.author: megaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks great works poor
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and loved the watch for a while then, it would just stop working after working well for a couple of days. I would reset the time and it worked again for a week or so then just stop. Returned to be fixed, Amazon took watch with no problems then returned it a couple of weeks later. No comments on what they did to "fix" it. But nothing changed. It now lives in the drawer of dead watches.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Dickover

customer_reviews.title: Looks & fits great, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this watch. Looks & fits great, works perfectly, and a great price. I have a pretty narrow wrist, and it looks great on me. Many compliments from people, especially on the beautiful brown face. Pretty unique look, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch that's easy to scratch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks very nice. Get lots of compliments. However, the face is very easy to scratch so if you are clumsy like me... the face may not look great for long.
customer_reviews.author: netwebdave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dads birthday and my boyfriend wants it! It’s a really cool and nice watch!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Mazar

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: at first i was slightly of put by the seconds hand but i learned to appreciate it and now think that it adds more character to the watch. I have gotten many compliments on this watch and I love it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! I even had it engraved on the back as I gave it to my fiance as a gift. It is very good quality and is glow in the dark (a feature my fiance found out later haha), but he is very happy with it. Says it is very comfortable and he wears it with both casual and professional outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites. All around good watch that goes well with all attire.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Runs good and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice watch. Looks good on as well. Got for my husband as he doesn't like to fancy. Still looks very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra p

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Clean style with contrasting background vs numbers and hands. Date is microscopic.
customer_reviews.author: mark perez

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This watch keeps great time and the chronograph is very precise. Can't get a better chronograph for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Great size if you like medium to larger 43mm face. The dark brown face is perfect. Cannot be beaten for the price. Well made Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: A-D

customer_reviews.title: Very masculine and eye catching.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my son and one for myself. We both own several expensive Swiss watches. I wear this one all the time. Very striking and masculine. I get several compliments on this watch every day. This watch could use a larger date window. It's almost microscopic. Plus, the strap needs to be a quarter inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch for its price.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is one of my favorite watches to date. It is so beautiful, and it works like a watch should. Its manly style will literally go with any outfit due to its diverse capabilities, and this is definitely recommended for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the small thin leather band. So got a wider thicker leather band... Watch have many. seem to go this one all the time... That simple! ! nice accurate time piece.
customer_reviews.author: Machacho

customer_reviews.title: Seiko win
customer_reviews.text: Seiko quality! Functions excellently while looking and feeling good on the wrist. I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Glows in dark!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, many compliments. I thought it was black but the chocolate is different.
customer_reviews.author: kanden keo

customer_reviews.title: Fancy watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband. He loved it. It’s comfortable on the wrist. Looks very fancy!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Kotler

customer_reviews.title: Matches well with darker brown footwear, jackets or coats.
customer_reviews.text: Pairs well with my brown leather bike jacket. Has a little heft to it. Feels like it was decently made.
customer_reviews.author: Naes Nelom

customer_reviews.title: not a bad watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its nicer then the pictures, feels classy, not a bad watch for the price
customer_reviews.author: rakan.m.alsayegh

customer_reviews.title: good looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, keeps excellent time as it should, and is very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap leather band
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure probably return it or not already day 1 ,band strap broke usable not sure , return it or not I think I will because got it on sale , Buying a new band defeats the savings Disappointed cheap cheap band
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to read and is keeping good time so far. This was a replacement for a Seiko watch I had for more than 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice the workmanship is good but not great. At this price I am pleased but do not think it is special. A good watch at a good price not a great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: steven l harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chrono watch, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice packed, it feels premium in your hand, one epic watch to add to your collection, very nice sports looking and everything works perfect. Simply amazing for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Bohorquez

customer_reviews.title: It is a great time piece
customer_reviews.text: It is a great time piece. And the best that you dont find it nowhwere else. Is very nice I love it and very low cost for such a nice watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They all loved them, and they looked even nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these watches as gifts for my groomsmen. They all loved them, and they looked even nicer in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Flatter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding watch
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding in every way. I have been looking for a watch for a while, and Prime day was the right day to get it. great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered. The name Seiko says it all. Great lume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: band too small
customer_reviews.text: nice watch, would have liked it better if it didn't have a scratch on the bezel.
customer_reviews.author: stan lester

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for an 18 yr old. They love it!!! Looks very sharp and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: ukes4me

customer_reviews.title: Loved the watch...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this watch since last 4 months. I love this watch. It goes well with any outfit. My sister had gifted me this watch. It's a great watch at great price :)
customer_reviews.author: Darshil Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up and looks classy. I have a smaller wrist and this fits just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mandar Barve

customer_reviews.title: Leather watch bands should not be on watches meant for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch but hated the leather band. I wore my watch daily at the YMCA when I went swimming and the band started giving off a mildew smell so I had to order a stainless steel band to replace.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Creason

customer_reviews.title: don't pass up this watch. Closeout price is too low not to buy
customer_reviews.text: Use as an everyday watch. Casio makes a fine watch and I get many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg S. Gurtizen

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for grandson. It was exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for any age. Stylish, leather band, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great functional field watch. Check the wristband size first.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch but the wristband is too small for my 8.5” wrist. I had to spend a few extra dollars to get a quality wristband that fits. That is the only issue I’ve had with the watch so far.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A handsome timepiece and a great price. Great way to own a chrono without laying out big bucks.
customer_reviews.author: ROGATIONDAYS

customer_reviews.title: stylish and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: simple to operate all features. An accurate timepiece. Time will tell how well the watchband holds up. Stylish good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Malaney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent watch for the price. It looks similar to an IWC flight chronograph aesthetically but costs only $100. The quartz movement makes it accurate although it is not as expensive as a mechanical chronograph.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Seiko SNN241
customer_reviews.text: the watch is very good as it appears in the description and it took only one week to deliver in Sri Lanka everything is fine and it fits nice on hands and I would like to recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Prashan d.

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking watch. Date and time are easy to read. Chronograph is easy to work, however the minutes passed is a little small. The large second hand counts off the minutes as they pass. The watch band is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Male

customer_reviews.title: Just love it, the leathe strap and the case material ...
customer_reviews.text: Guess I'll stuck with this brand for the rest of my life. Just love it, the leathe strap and the case material are extremely good. I truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a birthday present for my husband. He has a slight vision problem and I believe he will have no problem seeing the hands on this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice brown face watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: As frecuently happens, the picture of this watch does not makes justice to it! The watch is much elegant and nice in person than it looks here. Decent case size (43 mm), not too big for a regular wrist (wich is my case). Its dark brown face contrast perfectly with de arabic numbers and hands in the dial and subdials that makes easy to read the time and cronograph feature. It has a sporty and casual look too, and the soft leather band is good quality. The luminous of hands and dial marker is great for night time and dark conditions. Summarizing, I do recomend this Seiko watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Gets Compliments On It All The Time
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for son sixteenth and he absolutly loves it. It's very stylish and he likes the leather band for a more comfortable fit. We were looking for a classic looking watch and this absolutly fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Family

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, at a better price.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for this price. Would highly recommend. Keeps great time. Easy to read in the dark, even without my glasses. Comfortable band. Wife loves the look.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Watches
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for the price, Seiko is a respected brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle1

customer_reviews.title: Spanish review
customer_reviews.text: English: I love my new watch!! This watch is all that i want it. it's a elegant watch with the leather band, but I bought a NATO green watch band and change it. now looks like an sport watch... The watch with the leather band it's a clasic watch, elegant, nice, comfortable... Spanish: Me encanto este reloj! buscaba por un reloj que me sirviera para eventos elegantes y para el dia normal. Este reloj complace esas dos necesidades. Compre una correa estilo militar para cambiarle las de cuero con las que viene el reloj. lo hice y me quedo un reloj deportivo muy cool! El reloj por sí solo es muy bonito y elegante.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Garzon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Bartender who constantly has his hands covered in water, disinfected and alcohol of all types and the watch and band show no signs of wear. Looks fantastic, feels even better and after dropping it a couple of times on hard surfaces not a single mark. Very happy Seiko customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch . keep bumping the stop watch start no biggie , never use the stop watch feature .
customer_reviews.author: ed boeshart

customer_reviews.title: Goodwatch. Looks good and I like the clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Good watch. Looks good and I like the clean design. I can only suggest less distance between the holes in the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicelooking and elegant watch. The only thing about ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nicelooking and elegant watch. The only thing about it was the lack of its dial diameter on your web store. Such information should always be there for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ghailan Alsayab

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch. Easy to use in the functions
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Easy to use in the functions. Bright glow in the dark indicators when exposed to direct sunlight for a good amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did not look that great in person. Good quality watch tho
customer_reviews.author: nyron

customer_reviews.title: A Man’s Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking brown face watch. Installed a brown NATO band and it looks awesome. Looks tough! Couldn’t be happier. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Seiko men's watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. He received it July 13,2016. He like the leather band, the numbers and the black background.
customer_reviews.author: T Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific watch. It was my first chronograph but now I can never go back. The date feature has been a little troublesome for me but I think that's because I don't really know how to work it. Anyways, it looks great and always goes with whatever I'm wearing. Masculine look.
customer_reviews.author: Viveairo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It was a gift for my dad and I think he loved it as well. Beautiful piece and perfect fit on his wrist!
customer_reviews.author: Nish T

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Really just a beautiful and comfortable watch, thin and the stiff leather makes the watch feel not shakey on your wrist ever. I love the watch and its held up with no scratches over the first month of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful brown watch, with brown face and brown wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Milton D. Johnson III (SAME)

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. This watch is beautiful and my boyfriend loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This watch is beautiful and my boyfriend loves it. It has been a year since I bought it for him, and it still looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Glisan

customer_reviews.title: out look
customer_reviews.text: Nice to ware runs the time accurately. Leather strap adds to the style.
customer_reviews.author: YRS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, high quality build. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Georgian

product_meta.title: Seiko Men's SNN241 Stainless Steel Watch with Brown Leather Band
product_meta.description:
Stainless steel case measures 42mm diameter by 11mm thick. Brown genuine leather strap includes a stainless steel buckle. Luminous white hands and hour markers contrast well with the brown dial. Date display at the sixth hour. Chronograph measures up to sixty minutes of activity. Precisely tuned Japanese Quartz movement. Crafted scratch resistant Hardlex crystal. Water resistant up to 100 meters.

Round stainless steel watch with chronograph subdials and contrast stitching on leather strap. Japanese quartz movement with analog display. Protective Hardlex crystal dial window. Features screw-down case back, date window, and double locking clasp with push-button release. Water-resistant to 100 m (330 ft).




From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



See more

 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 2.88 Ounces
 * Item model number :SNN241
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 4, 2010
 * Manufacturer :Seiko
 * ASIN :B0044XDZII

    *  #44808 inMen's Shops

feature_bullets: Versatile stainless steel watch featuring brown dial with two subdials and date window at 6 o'clock
42.6-mm stainless steel case with hardlex dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Contrast-stitched leather band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
